ovdesc.p: FATCA.ROLE.TYPE is used to identify the roles that can be identified as joint, beneficial or substantial roles.

FATCA.STATUS is not only based on the status of the client or the entity but also on the status of joint, beneficial and substantial owners (as updated in JO.BO.STATUS of FATCA.CUSTOMER.SUPPLEMENTARY.INFO).
The JO.BO.STATUS will only be updated for roles identified as joint, beneficial or substantial in FATCA.ROLE.TYPE.

desc.p: The ID of FATCA.ROLE.TYPE will be a valid company code.
The roles that are identified as beneficial owner roles will be included in the BENEFICIAL.ROLES field.
Role that can be defined in FATCA.CUSTOMER.SUPPLEMENTARY.INFO field ROLE.TYPE.
The roles that are identified as Joint owner roles will be included in the JOINT.ROLES field.
Role that can be defined in FATCA.CUSTOMER.SUPPLEMENTARY.INFO field ROLE.TYPE.
The roles that are identified as substantial owner roles will be included in the SUBSTANTIAL.ROLES field.
Role that can be defined in FATCA.CUSTOMER.SUPPLEMENTARY.INFO field ROLE.TYPE.
